title: key
body: Hello, my esc for menu is not working on this keyboard i have laptop btw and is there any othere way to chenge ingame settings so i can open to change graphic and other stuff ?

replies.body: In-game options can be enabled via the HUD.  You will see a small gear icon next to your mini-map and camera icon that will open up in-game options.  Otherwise, you may need to look into repairing your keyboard, or attaching an external one for your laptop.  I use a laptop to play, and have a Blackwidow Chroma connected for a more PC experience.  :D  Hope that helps!
ty so much man  its cool to see riot replay to me xd
